name: Acute Vision
summary: Your senses improve when you are raging.

name: Adrenaline Rush
summary: In the heat of battle, you are capable of amazing feats of strength.

name: Draconic Arrogance
summary: Few can sway you from your goals while the fury of combat fills you.

name: Moment of Clarity
summary: You push back your rage for a moment in order to think clearly.

name: Raging Intimidation
summary: Your fury fills your foes with fear.

name: Raging Thrower
summary: Thrown weapons become especially deadly in your fury. You apply the additional damage from Rage to your thrown weapon attacks. If you have the Brutal Critical feat or the devastator class feature, apply their benefits to thrown weapon attacks.

name: Sudden Charge
summary: With a quick sprint, you dash up to your foe and swing.

name: Acute Scent
summary: When you Rage, your sense of smell improves.

name: Bashing Charge
summary: You smash, bust, and charge through solid obstacles without hesitation.

name: Elemental Evolution
summary: The elemental power within you is more mutable and versatile than most.

name: Furious Finish
summary: Desperate to finish the fight, you pour all your rage into one final blow.

name: No Escape
summary: You keep pace with a retreating foe.

name: Second Wind
summary: You can enter a second rage, but afterward you need to catch your breath.

name: Shake it Off
summary: You concentrate on your rage, overcoming fear and fighting back sickness.

name: Farabellus Flip
prerequisite: Trained in Acrobatics; trained in medium armor
summary: Surprisingly agile even in a breastplate and carrying a full rucksack, Marcos Farabellus developed this evasive maneuver during one of his many adventures.

name: Fast Movement
summary: Your rage is a frenzy of rapid movements.

name: Ghost Wrangler
summary: Spirits around you coalesce upon your fists, enabling you to seize and harm other ghosts and spirits.

name: Inured to Alchemy
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #178: Punks in a Powderkeg pg. 79</row>
summary: You've developed control over how your body processes alchemical poisons and drugs.

name: Oversized Throw
summary: With a great heave, you seize a piece of your surroundings, such as a boulder, log, table, wagon, or chunk of earth, and hurl it at your foes.

name: Raging Athlete
summary: Physical obstacles can’t hold back your fury.

name: Spiritual Guides
summary: Though no one sees them and only you can hear them, the spirits around you constantly chatter, save when you are raging.

name: Supernatural Senses
prerequisite: Acute Scent or precise or imprecise scent
summary: Your scent is preternaturally sharp, and you can always rely on your sense of smell to help guide you when your vision is compromised.

name: Wounded Rage
summary: You roar in pain, awakening the rage within you.

name: Animal Skin
summary: When you are raging and unarmored, your skin transforms into a thick hide.

name: Attack of Opportunity
summary: You swat a foe that leaves an opening.

name: Brutal Bully
summary: You push your foes around and leave bruises.

name: Cleave
summary: You swing clear through one foe and into another.

name: Dragon's Rage Breath
summary: You exhale powerful draconic energy.

name: Elemental Explosion
summary: You unleash the energy roiling within you.

name: Giant's Stature
summary: You grow to incredible size.

name: Inner Strength
summary: Your strength is part of your rage, so as long as your anger remains, you can gather your strength and rage to overcome any sort of enfeeblement.

name: Mage Hunter
summary: You use your hatred of magic to lash out at the sight of spellcasting, allowing you to interrupt an enemy's spell.

name: Nocturnal Sense
prerequisite: Acute Scent or precise or imprecise scent and low-light vision
summary: Your senses gain even greater clarity.

name: Pain Tolerance
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #178: Punks in a Powderkeg pg. 79</row>
summary: You gain resistance to mental damage equal to half your level and a +1 circumstance bonus to saving throws against effects that would make you clumsy, drained, or enfeebled.

name: Scouring Rage
prerequisite: an instinct that allows you to change your additional damage from Rage to a different damage type
summary: You emit a powerful surge of instinctual energy when you unleash your potential.

name: Spirits' Interference
summary: You call forth protective spirits to ward off ranged attacks.

name: Animal Rage
trait: Barbarian, Concentrate, Polymorph, Primal, Rage, Transmutation
summary: You transform into your animal.

name: Disarming Assault
summary: You attack with enough force to knock the weapon out of your foe's hands.

name: Follow-Up Assault
summary: Even in the face of failure you press the attack, determined to succeed.

name: Friendly Toss
summary: You toss your friends around the battlefield.

name: Furious Bully
summary: You bully foes across the battlefield.

name: Instinctive Strike
prerequisite: Acute Scent or precise or imprecise scent
summary: You trust your instincts and your sense of smell, using all of your senses to pinpoint your opponent's location.

name: Renewed Vigor
summary: You pause to recover your raging vigor.

name: Share Rage
summary: You stoke an ally’s fury.

name: Thrash
summary: You thrash the grabbed foe around.

name: Come and Get Me
summary: You open yourself to attacks so you can respond in turn.

name: Corpse-Killer's Defiance
summary: You defy Tar-Baphon with every undead you destroy, using your victory to rally your allies.

name: Determined Dash
summary: Nothing can keep you from your enemy.

name: Furious Sprint
summary: You rush forward.

name: Great Cleave
summary: Your fury carries your weapon through multiple foes.

name: Impressive Landing
summary: You slam into the ground, shattering it around you.

name: Knockback
summary: The weight of your swing drives your enemy back.

name: Resounding Blow
summary: You strike your enemy in the head with such force that their ears ring.

name: Silencing Strike
summary: A quick strike to the face or mouth silences your opponent.

name: Tangle of Battle
summary: Your incredibly vicious Strike pulls you right in close, giving you the opportunity to grab your foe.

name: Terrifying Howl
summary: You unleash a terrifying howl.

name: Dragon's Rage Wings
summary: You sprout dragon wings from your back.

name: Embrace the Pain
summary: Ignoring your pain, you reach out and grab the creature or weapon that caused you harm.

name: Furious Grab
summary: You grab your foe while it’s distracted by your attack.

name: Predator's Pounce
summary: You close the distance to your prey in a blur.

name: Spirit's Wrath
summary: You call forth an ephemeral apparition.

name: Sunder Spell
summary: You draw upon your superstitious fury to destroy a spell.

name: Titan's Stature
summary: You grow to even greater size.

name: Unbalancing Sweep
summary: You make a great sweep about yourself, knocking creatures off their feet and away from you.

name: Awesome Blow
summary: Your attacks are so powerful, they can flatten your opponents.

name: Giant's Lunge
summary: You extend your body and prepare to attack foes outside your normal reach.

name: Impaling Thrust
summary: You impale your enemy and hold them in place with your weapon.

name: Sunder Enchantment
summary: You can focus your superstition to break the magic of an item, in addition to destroying freestanding spells and those active on creatures.

name: Vengeful Strike
summary: When struck by an enemy, you respond in turn.

name: Whirlwind Strike
summary: You lash out in a blur of motion, attacking all nearby adversaries.

name: Collateral Thrash
summary: When you Thrash a grabbed foe, you smack that foe into another nearby.

name: Dragon Transformation
trait: Barbarian, Concentrate, Polymorph, Primal, Rage, Transmutation
summary: You transform into a ferocious large dragon.

name: Furious Vengeance
summary: Your enemy's blow fuels your rage and provokes your immediate retaliation.

name: Penetrating Projectile
summary: Your projectiles are unhindered by flesh and bone.

name: Shattering Blows
summary: Your forceful blows shatter objects with ease.

name: Brutal Critical
summary: Your critical hits are particularly devastating.

name: Perfect Clarity
summary: You burn out all of your rage to ensure that your attack lands and your mind remains free.

name: Vicious Evisceration
summary: You make a vicious attack that maims your enemy.

name: Annihilating Swing
summary: You have learned from the brute destructive power of xulgaths and their kind.

name: Contagious Rage
summary: You can drive your allies into a frenzy, granting them incredible benefits.

name: Quaking Stomp
summary: You stomp the ground with such force that it creates a minor earthquake.

name: Unstoppable Juggernaut
source: <row gap="tiny">Advanced Player's Guide pg. 111 <sup>2.0</sup>, Pathfinder #150: Broken Promises pg. 76</row>
summary: You have become a brutal, unstoppable force of nature, able to shrug off mortal wounds with ease.

name: Whirlwind Toss
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #168: King of the Mountain pg. 77</row>
summary: You whirl a foe to smash into all nearby creatures before throwing them far away.
